predicate.note: Frames file for 'transplant' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: move from one place to another

example.name: just transitive
example.text: But no one has made a serious effort *trace* to transplant the crop.

example.name: with destination
example.text: Twenty years later, two California academics, Stanley Cohen and Herbert Boyer, made ``recombinant'' DNA, *trace* transplanting a toad's gene into bacteria, which then reproduced toad genes.
example.arg: *trace* -> two California academics, Stanley Cohen and Herbert Boyer,
bacteria, which then reproduced toad genes

example.name: with source
example.text: Mary's sense of fair play was transplanted *trace* from Adolf Hitler.
